isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - CHARGE AIR COOLER; REPLACE

step1.para: Chock wheels.
Remove front bumper assembly and open hood.
Remove hood tilt assist torsion bars.
Disconnect hood wiring harness and stop cables. Close hood.
Remove hood pivot bolts. Remove hood assembly using 2 people.
Drain cooling system.
Remove engine splash shield.
Remove charge air cooler hoses and cap open ports.
Disconnect water heater hose from mount bracket at radiator. Secure out of way for access.
Remove right recirculation shield.
Disconnect air conditioner pressure transducer and disconnect A/C lines from shroud. Disconnect and reposition condenser assembly if applicable.
Disconnect fan hub air hose if applicable.
Disconnect surge tank hoses necessary to remove radiator assembly with surge tank attached.
Disconnect surge tank low level sensor wiring.
Disconnect ground strap from lower left side of radiator.
Disconnect radiator hose from thermostat housing.
Remove lower radiator hose (right side).
Disconnect lower radiator stay rods.
Remove lower radiator rock grill screws.
Remove upper frame cross member with rock grill attached.
Remove lower frame cross member, include remove tow hooks.
Install lifting device to radiator assembly.
Remove radiator assembly mounting bolts and remove assembly, include remove lifting device.
Remove left recirculation shield.
Remove surge tank from radiator frame, include disconnect hose from radiator to surge tank (at tank).
Remove engine shroud from radiator assembly.
Disconnect heater hose from fitting at radiator frame.
Remove radiator core support frame sides from assembly.
Remove charge air cooler with mount brackets attached.
Remove charge air cooler mount brackets from charge air cooler.
Install charge air cooler mount brackets to charge air cooler. Install charge air cooler with brackets attached.
Install radiator core support frame sides.
Install engine shroud.
Install surge tank to radiator frame, include connect hose from radiator to surge tank (at tank).
Install left recirculation shield.
Connect heater hose to fitting at radiator frame.
Install hose and clamps to right side of radiator before installing radiator.

note.para: Do not shrink clamp at this time.

step1.para: Install radiator assembly using lifting device. Install mounting bolts and remove lifting device.
Connect lower radiator stay rods.
Connect ground cable (strap).
Install upper left radiator hose to thermostat housing and shrink clamps.

note.para: Use heat gun to shrink band. Apply heat to all accessible surfaces.

step1.para: Secure lower right radiator hose to radiator and front cover by shrinking clamps.
Connect surge tank hose(s) and connect low level sensor wiring.
Connect fan hub air hose if applicable.
Connect condenser assembly to radiator frame, include connect air conditioning hose clips to engine shroud if applicable.
Connect air conditioner pressure transducer, include install plastic ties if applicable.
Install right recirculation shield.
Install lower frame cross member, include install tow hooks.
Install upper frame cross member with rock grill attached.
Install lower radiator rock grill screws to lower frame cross member.
Install charge air cooler hoses.
Connect heater hose to mount bracket at radiator.
Fill cooling system.
Install hood assembly using 2 people. Install hood pivot bolts.
Connect hood stop cable and wiring harness.
Install hood tilt assist torsion bars.
Check for leaks. Top off fluids as needed.
Install engine splash shield and close hood.
Install front bumper assembly and remove wheel chocks.
